duties_responsibilities.duty: Responsible for the daily functions of one or more handscoring contracts, including scheduling, resource planning, and developing item-specific training.
Managing a team of Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers during active scoring, and performing post-project work and data analysis.
Applying science expertise throughout item development and scoring process, including meetings with clients and educators.
Clear communication to a variety of roles daily, including via chat, email, phone, and videoconference meetings.
Training and coaching Scoring Directors, Supervisors, and Scorers in the expectations of their roles and how to perform those duties.
Mentoring and training via live training or a pre-recorded module Science and potentially Math items to a large and varied scorer population.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree required; degree within Life Science or Physical Sciences is strongly preferred. Additional Math college courses are preferred.
